data.subject: her flowers.
data.message:
Emptiness that goes beyond the horizon,
And all this pain floods my eyes,
And pours out my soul,
Hate swells my heart,
And I can't distinguish myself in the dark,
From the fear,
Cause there's just so much,
And there's no luck,
And the locks are locked,
I can't get out,
I can't escape doubt.
The razor blade,
It calls my name,
It says "drown your pain in blood"
Because loves is dead,
Hope is dead,
And the flowers, her flowers,
They're alive. They belong to her.
So now I'm wondering,
How many hours I've got left,
Before the heart beneath my breast ..
Seices to beat

data.subject: forget me not
data.message:
Forget me not while I tried &' intent,
Of such a truth that my hearts words meant.
My great travail, so gladly spent.
Forget me not yet.

Forget me not yet, like when this first began.
The weary life you knew of me is beneath the sand.
The old ways, my sorrow, I gave the sad my hand.
Forget me not yet, and so you ran.

Forget me not yet, those great meaningless words,
The cruel wrongs not committed, the scornful ways;
You never seen.
The painful patience in demays,
Forget me not yet, I whispered with one last breath.

data.subject: one last dance
data.message:
Our love was like a dance
Just spinning round &' round
You used to really love me,
But that was before we hit the ground.
Now I tell you I miss you,
You tell me it's not true.
I said that I loved you,
You said that won't do.
I prayed at night hold you,
I want a second chance.
I want to make you mine again,
Give me one last dance..

data.subject: moonlit goodbyes
data.message:
There she stood under the moonlight,
It's rays kissing her velvet skin.
Pain piercing through pale eyes,
Her hopeless heart suffering endless demise.
Meanwhile the world remains blind to her hurt filled tears,
And their ears remain deaf to her bloody cries.
She calls for help, but there's no reply.
So there, under the moonlight,
She says goodbye
So there under the moonlight,
She lays there and dies.

data.subject: utterly divine
data.message:
crying out, i want to leave.

such a dumbass always wearing my heart on my sleeve.

plague of perfection,

misplaced affection.

screw it all,

fuck the love fall.

bullet to the brain,

no more fucking pain.

c'mon open sky, let it rain.

driving a knife through the heart,

unable to rewind back to the start.

shot gun, 

hand gun,

who cares which one;

just get the damn job done.

bleeding tears

lack of faith, no fears.

blood trickling down the drain;

not dying, immortal freak;

i must be going insane.

no more placing blame

getting mad, i can see your veins.

fuck the bullshit, im tired of games

laughter lingers far back in my mind while you say i dont see it,

fuck i must be blind

or loving without light

because you are the closest fright.

the coldest whisper in the night.

data.subject: Poison of lies
data.message:
I am the wrath, the hooded foe,
Enemy within.
Broken hearts falling in the air - never to mend,
Announcing the end. The ghosts of fear,
aimed and ready,
to guard the doors of love and life.
Because i cause the pain and strife,
that makes you wish to die.
And from my loins,
springs the poison of lies.

broken hearts,

will always

fly...

data.subject: bucket list :D
data.message:
just SOME things I'd like to accomplish
• save a life :D
• wish on a star &' have it come true ★
• swim with sharks
• sky dive in a kayak
• drive down the wrong side of the highway
• make love on the beach ;*
• fight for freedom love &' liberty ( ':
• love a guy just as much as he loves me
• find my mommy &' get her clean (y)
• donate a kidney ^_^
• make my family proud
• start a foundation for the families of fallen soldiers (name it healing the broken wings of fallen angels)
• learn to fly planes xD
• help a horse give birth o.O
• free Cuba >: D
• have my name written in history books ♥
• fall in love over &' over again with the same person ♪♪
• play basketball with Steven Spielberg
• build an underwater home
• make amends with everyone I've ever hurt ; im sorry but that's never enough
• forget the pain
• save somebody from a burning building
• sing a song to butterflies <3
• have a stadium of people chant my name ( ':
• give lil wayne CPR *blush*
• fall in love with a bestfriend
• walk hand in hand in the rain with the love of my life
• live in the tallest building in new york (y)
• find the cure for aids, cancer &' a broken heart
• make a human magnet so when a cute guy walks by, he's automatically drawn to me ( ;
• get lost in a forest
• have a pet tiger
• play for the giants &'
make the winning touchdown :D
• find all the pieces to my shattered heart &' piece them together
• forgive myself
• start a family
• live the American dream
• write a love song <3
• turn a gay man straight ( ;
